title: Slack CEO Stewart Butterfield to Depart; Salesforce names current cloud executive Lidiane Jones to run messaging app
text:
Mr. Butterfield's departure, earlier reported by Insider, comes just days after Salesforce said its co-CEO, Bret Taylor, would be leaving the company in January.

Write to Will Feuer at will.feuer@wsj.com

Slack CEO Stewart Butterfield to Depart
